name: Hey! Want to do something fun together?
name_original: Hey! Want to do something fun together?
description:
Hey! Want to do something fun together? Spend some time hanging out with your cat friend!

Small interactive about socialising.

Credits:
Programming / Art: Splerp
Sound effects (cat meows): Acclivity (https://freesound.org/people/acclivity/sounds/83934/)
